subject: Education
title: Sensitive Periods: Windows of Opportunity
description: A quick, practical guide to Sensitive Periods: Windows of Opportunity.

hook.text: Kittens blindfolded for the first weeks of life never develop normal visionâ€”even after the blindfold is removed.

buildup.text: Sensitive periods are windows when the brain is especially receptive to certain types of input.

discovery.text: Vision, language, and emotional regulation each have sensitive periods in the first five years.

twist.text: Missing a sensitive period doesn't mean learning is impossibleâ€”just significantly harder.

climax.text: Understanding these windows helps prioritize the right experiences at the right developmental stage.

punchline.text: The brain is always learning. But some doors open easier when ajar.

quiz.question: What happens if a sensitive period is missed?
options: Learning in that area becomes significantly harder but not impossible
The child can never develop that ability
Another sensitive period opens immediately to compensate
